refnamediv.refpurpose: fetch articles from the server to the mbox

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Fetch messages from the server and save them into the mailbox (mbox format). Every argument is supposed to be a name of group, optionally followed by a '>' character and mbox filename. If the mbox filename is omitted, it defaults to the name of the group.

Besides global options (described in
sinntp 1 ), &p; command takes following options:
--limit=N
Pull at most N messages.
--reget
Start from the first available message.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: &p; --server=news.example.org --limit=50 'comp.os.linux>os-linux' Fetches at most the 50 newest articles from the newsgroup comp.os.linux located on news.example.org server and appends them to the os-linux mailbox file.

&p; --server=news.example.net --reget --limit=3 comp.os.windows Fetches at most the 3 oldest articles from the newsgroup comp.os.windows located on news.example.net server and appends them to the comp.os.windows mailbox file.
